clean.title: Clean user simulations folder
clean.description: Are you sure you want to clean the folder of user {{username}}?

un-block.title: Disable or Re-enable User
un-block.block: Are you sure you want to disable the user {{username}}?
un-block.unblock: Are you sure you want to re-enable the user {{username}}?

dialog.title: {{username}}'s info
dialog.description: This is the file tree for the user {{username}}. You can click in any file to download.
